title: Iván Morales
text:
José Iván Morales Elvira (born 9 October 1991) is a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who challenged for the <a href="International%20Boxing%20Federation">IBF</a> <a href="bantamweight">bantamweight</a> title in 2016. He is the younger brother of both <a href="Diego%20Morales%20%28boxer%29">Diego Morales</a> and of <a href="Erik%20Morales">Erik Morales</a>.
Professional career.
In December 2009, Iván knocked out Cristian Zavala to win his pro debut in <a href="Rosarito%2C%20Baja%20California">Rosarito, Baja California</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>.
